tool_description: Manages customer profile deletion requests with compliance validation, data anonymization, and audit trail generation for GDPR right to erasure.

deletion_type.description: Type of deletion: soft_delete, hard_delete, or anonymize

deletion_reason.description: Reason for deletion: customer_request, gdpr_erasure, account_closure, legal_requirement, or admin_action

retain_transaction_history.description: Whether to retain anonymized transaction data for legal/financial compliance

force_deletion.description: Whether to override retention requirements (admin only)

error_messages: Customer not found: No profile exists for the provided customer_id.
Invalid deletion_type: Use one of [soft_delete, hard_delete, anonymize].
Invalid deletion_reason: Use one of [customer_request, gdpr_erasure, account_closure, legal_requirement, admin_action].
Deletion blocked: Active legal hold or regulatory requirement prevents deletion.
Outstanding obligations: Customer has pending orders or unresolved disputes that prevent deletion.
Insufficient permissions: User lacks authorization for requested deletion type.
usage: Provide customer_id, deletion_type, and deletion_reason to process deletion request. The tool validates legal requirements and executes appropriate deletion strategy.

deletion_successful.description: Whether deletion request was successfully processed

deletion_id.description: Unique identifier for this deletion operation

data_categories_deleted.description: List of data categories that were deleted or anonymized

data_categories_retained.description: List of data categories retained due to legal requirements
